chatbot.title: AI Chatbot
chatbot.welcome: Hello! I'm the HongBookStore AI chatbot. How can I help you?

questions.sellBook: I want to sell a book.
questions.buyBook: I want to buy a book.
questions.bookPrice: How do I set book prices?
questions.locationMismatch: My location is different from the recommended trade location.

answers.sellBook:
To sell a book:

1. Click 'Book Registration' in the top menu
2. Enter book information and condition
3. Set the price and register
4. Wait for purchase inquiries via chat

We automatically recommend appropriate prices based on book condition.
answers.buyBook:
To buy a book:

1. Click 'Marketplace' in the top menu
2. Search for the book you want
3. Check book details
4. Proceed with the trade via chat with the seller

You can also find wanted books in the 'Wanted Board'.
answers.safeTrade:
Tips for safe trading:

• Meet in public places (library, cafe, etc.)
• We recommend cash transactions
• Always check book condition before trading
• Stop the trade if anything seems suspicious

We do not guarantee transactions.
answers.bookPrice:
How to set book prices:

• Select book condition on the registration page for automatic price recommendations
• Check demand in the 'Wanted Board'
• Set reasonable prices based on market prices
answers.wantedBoard:
The wanted board is where you can find books you want:

• Register books you want, and sellers can contact you
• Freely set book condition and desired price
• Identify books with high demand
answers.myBookstore:
My bookstore is where you manage your registered books:

• Modify the status of your registered books
• Manage sold books
• Check your bookstore statistics
answers.tradeChat:
Trade chat is where buyers and sellers communicate:

• Ask questions about books
• Negotiate trade conditions
• Set appointment time and location
answers.forgotTrade:
If you forgot your trade appointment:

• Check your trade history in 'My Transactions'
• Review appointment details in chat history
• Contact the seller again to reschedule
answers.mapFeature:
The map feature allows you to share and categorize places around campus:

• Users share information about places needed for campus life
• Find various campus life locations, not just trade locations
• Check ratings and reviews for places
answers.locationMismatch:
If your location is different from actual:

• Click 'Location Management' in My Page
• Add a new location with 'Add New Location'
• Set as default location for automatic recommendations

subAnswers.withdraw:
How to withdraw your account:

1. Click 'Account Withdrawal' in My Page
2. Enter your password for verification
3. Review and agree to the withdrawal terms

All data will be permanently deleted upon withdrawal.
subAnswers.findId:
How to find your ID:

1. Click 'Find ID' on the login page
2. Enter the email you used during registration
3. We'll send your ID to your email
subAnswers.findPassword:
How to find your password:

1. Click 'Find Password' on the login page
2. Enter your ID and email
3. We'll send a temporary password to your email
subAnswers.studentVerification:
How to verify student status:

1. Click 'School Email Verification' in My Page
2. Enter your g.hongik.ac.kr email
3. Check your email and enter the verification code

Once verified, you can use all services including second-hand trading without restrictions.
